DOC.brief_summary: Age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) lead cause blindness United States . Low dietary intake low blood level lutein zeaxanthin , pigment find macular region human retina , associate increase risk AMD . We report dietary supplementation lutein zeaxanthin increase macular pigment ( MP ) eye . MP effectively absorb blue light well quenches reactive oxygen specie ( ROS ) . Green tea polyphenols also effective scavenger ROS vitro . Our goal elucidate effectively increase MP physiologic level antioxidant supplementation . We hypothesize lutein tea polyphenols protect macula eye increase MP carotenoid effectively antioxidant mechanism .
